title: Dinwini be dibosha, Bibar badi somaina
lyrics:
Dinwini be dibosha, Bibar badi somaina
Jwngkhou fwjakhangw, Jwngkhou thulungayw-2
(A)
Bifang, Bibar, bithaibw thaiyw, Daosen daolafwrbw Bafwiyw
Fwrbuni mungwi gabjrikhaow, Be buhuma somaiswtharw -2
(B)
Gwthar bibelkhou bujinw hayw, Dhwrwm lamakhou sinai hayw
Gwthar Jiua basa lafwiyw, Jwbnw gwiywi jiu mwnkhatharw-2
(C)
Dukhu somaobw Banjaifwyw,  Andaibwla lama dinthiyw
Sudem bara suglaihwfwyw, Hajw halabw rongzakhangw-2
